name: Kingdom Of Flesh
description: Kingdom of Flesh is a 2D Top-Down styled game. You are one of the sole humans in a world of zombies... how could you possibly get along? By giving them your flesh for their goods of course! It combines RPG elements and simple open-world sandbox gameplay in order to create a different experience for all players. After completing a tutorial level, you are sent into the wilderness to found your own sprawling village. Many types of people will move in and help you to continue to grow your own kingdom of loyal zombies.
